verses.text: Now there \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* a \w certain|strong="H0259"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* of the \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* unto \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* my \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* is \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*; and thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* that thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* did \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and the \w creditor|strong="H5383"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w take|strong="H3947"\w* unto him my \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H3206"\w* to be \w bondmen|strong="H5650"\w*.

And \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, What shall I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* for thee? \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* me, what \w hast|strong="H3426"\w* thou in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*? And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thine \w handmaid|strong="H8198"\w* hath not any thing in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, save a \w pot|strong="H0610"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.

Then he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w borrow|strong="H7592"\w* thee \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w* of all thy \w neighbours|strong="H7934"\w*, \add even\add* \w empty|strong="H7386"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*; borrow not a \w few|strong="H4591"\w*.\f + \fr 4.3 \ft borrow not…: or, scant not\f*

And when thou art come \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, thou shalt \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* the \w door|strong="H1817"\w* upon thee and upon thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and shalt pour \w out|strong="H3332"\w* into all those \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, and thou shalt set \w aside|strong="H5265"\w* that which is \w full|strong="H4392"\w*.

So she \w went|strong="H3212"\w* from him, and \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* the \w door|strong="H1817"\w* upon her and \w upon|strong="H1157"\w* her \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w who|strong="H1992"\w* \w brought|strong="H5066"\w* \add the vessels\add* to her; and she poured \w out|strong="H3332"\w*.

And it came to pass, when the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* were \w full|strong="H4390"\w*, that she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Bring|strong="H5066"\w* me yet a \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, \add There is\add* not a \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* more. And the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w stayed|strong="H5975"\w*.

Then she \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* thy \w debt|strong="H5386"\w*, and \w live|strong="H2421"\w* thou and thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w rest|strong="H3498"\w*.\f + \fr 4.7 \ft debt: or, creditor\f*

¶ And it fell on a \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* to \w Shunem|strong="H7766"\w*, where \add was\add* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*; and she \w constrained|strong="H2388"\w* him to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*. And \add so\add* it was, \add that\add* as \w oft|strong="H1767"\w* as he passed \w by|strong="H5674"\w*, he \w turned|strong="H5493"\w* in thither to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.\f + \fr 4.8 \ft it fell on a day: Heb. there was a day\f*\f + \fr 4.8 \ft constrained him: Heb. laid hold on him\f*

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, Behold now, I \w perceive|strong="H3045"\w* that this \add is\add* an \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which \w passeth|strong="H5674"\w* by us \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*.

Let us \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w chamber|strong="H5944"\w*, I pray thee, on the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*; and let us \w set|strong="H7760"\w* for him there a \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*, and a \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, and a \w stool|strong="H3678"\w*, and a \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w*: and it shall be, when he \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* to us, that he shall \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* in thither.
And it fell on a \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* thither, and he \w turned|strong="H5493"\w* into the \w chamber|strong="H5944"\w*, and \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* there.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* this \w Shunammite|strong="H7767"\w*. And when he had \w called|strong="H7121"\w* her, she \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* now unto her, Behold, thou hast been \w careful|strong="H2729"\w* for us with all this \w care|strong="H2731"\w*; what \add is\add* to be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* for thee? \w wouldest|strong="H3426"\w* thou be \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* for to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, or to the \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w*? And she \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* mine own \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What then \add is\add* to be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* for her? And \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Verily|strong="H0061"\w* she hath no \w child|strong="H1121"\w*, and her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* is \w old|strong="H2204"\w*.
And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* her. And when he had \w called|strong="H7121"\w* her, she \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w door|strong="H6607"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, About this \w season|strong="H4150"\w*, according to the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, thou shalt \w embrace|strong="H2263"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Nay, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \add thou\add* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, do not \w lie|strong="H3576"\w* unto thine \w handmaid|strong="H8198"\w*.\f + \fr 4.16 \ft season: Heb. set time\f*

And the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w*, and \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w* at that \w season|strong="H4150"\w* that \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* had \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto her, according to the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.

¶ And when the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* was \w grown|strong="H1431"\w*, it fell on a \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that he went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* to the \w reapers|strong="H7114"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, My \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, my \w head|strong="H7218"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to a \w lad|strong="H5288"\w*, \w Carry|strong="H5375"\w* him to his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*.

And when he had \w taken|strong="H5375"\w* him, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him to his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, he \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* on her \w knees|strong="H1290"\w* till \w noon|strong="H6672"\w*, and \add then\add* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.

And she went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w laid|strong="H7901"\w* him on the \w bed|strong="H4296"\w* of the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \add the door\add* upon him, and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

And she \w called|strong="H7121"\w* unto her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Send|strong="H7971"\w* me, I pray thee, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w*, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w asses|strong="H0860"\w*, that I may \w run|strong="H7323"\w* to the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and come \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherefore wilt thou \w go|strong="H1980"\w* to him to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*? \add it is\add* neither new \w moon|strong="H2320"\w*, nor \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*. And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add It shall be\add* \w well|strong="H7965"\w*.\f + \fr 4.23 \ft well: Heb. peace\f*

Then she \w saddled|strong="H2280"\w* an \w ass|strong="H0860"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to her \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, \w Drive|strong="H5090"\w*, and go \w forward|strong="H3212"\w*; \w slack|strong="H6113"\w* not \add thy\add* \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* for me, except I \w bid|strong="H0559"\w* thee.\f + \fr 4.24 \ft slack…: Heb. restrain not for me to ride\f*

So she \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* to \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*. And it came to pass, when the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* saw her afar \w off|strong="H7200"\w*, that he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, Behold, \add yonder is\add* \w that|strong="H1975"\w* \w Shunammite|strong="H7767"\w*:

\w Run|strong="H7323"\w* now, I pray thee, to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* her, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, \add Is it\add* \w well|strong="H7965"\w* with thee? \add is it\add* \w well|strong="H7965"\w* with thy \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*? \add is it\add* \w well|strong="H7965"\w* with the \w child|strong="H3206"\w*? And she \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \add It is\add* \w well|strong="H7965"\w*.

And when she \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* to the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*, she \w caught|strong="H2388"\w* him by the \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*: but \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w* came \w near|strong="H5066"\w* to thrust her \w away|strong="H1920"\w*. And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let her \w alone|strong="H7503"\w*; for her \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \add is\add* \w vexed|strong="H4843"\w* within her: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w hid|strong="H5956"\w* \add it\add* from me, and hath not \w told|strong="H5046"\w* me.\f + \fr 4.27 \ft him…: Heb. by his feet\f*\f + \fr 4.27 \ft vexed: Heb. bitter\f*

Then she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Did I \w desire|strong="H7592"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*? did I not \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Do not \w deceive|strong="H7952"\w* me?

Then he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w*, Gird \w up|strong="H2296"\w* thy \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* my \w staff|strong="H4938"\w* in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and go thy \w way|strong="H3212"\w*: if thou \w meet|strong="H4672"\w* any \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w salute|strong="H1288"\w* him not; and if \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w salute|strong="H1288"\w* thee, answer him not \w again|strong="H6030"\w*: and \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* my \w staff|strong="H4938"\w* upon the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w child|strong="H5288"\w*.

And the \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* of the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add As\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, and \add as\add* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, I will not \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* thee. And he \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w followed|strong="H3212"\w* her.

And \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w* passed \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, and \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* the \w staff|strong="H4938"\w* upon the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w child|strong="H5288"\w*; but \add there was\add* neither \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, nor \w hearing|strong="H7182"\w*. Wherefore he went \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* him, and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w child|strong="H5288"\w* is not \w awaked|strong="H6974"\w*.\f + \fr 4.31 \ft hearing: Heb. attention\f*

And when \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, behold, the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \add and\add* \w laid|strong="H7901"\w* upon his \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*.

He went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* therefore, and \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* the \w door|strong="H1817"\w* upon them \w twain|strong="H8147"\w*, and \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And he went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* upon the \w child|strong="H3206"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* upon his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* upon his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and his \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* upon his \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*: and he \w stretched|strong="H1457"\w* himself upon the child; and the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* waxed \w warm|strong="H2552"\w*.

Then he \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H0259"\w* and \w fro|strong="H0259"\w*; and went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w stretched|strong="H1457"\w* himself upon him: and the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w sneezed|strong="H2237"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*, and the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w opened|strong="H6491"\w* his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 4.35 \ft to and fro: Heb. once hither and once thither\f*

And he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* this \w Shunammite|strong="H7767"\w*. So he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* her. And when she was come \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto him, he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Take \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

Then she went \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* at his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* herself to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, and took \w up|strong="H5375"\w* her \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

¶ And \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* came \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*: and \add there was\add* a \w dearth|strong="H7458"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \add were\add* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him: and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, \w Set|strong="H8239"\w* on the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w pot|strong="H5518"\w*, and \w seethe|strong="H1310"\w* \w pottage|strong="H5138"\w* for the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*.

And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* to \w gather|strong="H3950"\w* \w herbs|strong="H0219"\w*, and \w found|strong="H4672"\w* a \w wild|strong="H7704"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, and \w gathered|strong="H3950"\w* thereof \w wild|strong="H7704"\w* \w gourds|strong="H6498"\w* his \w lap|strong="H0899"\w* \w full|strong="H4393"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w shred|strong="H6398"\w* \add them\add* into the \w pot|strong="H5518"\w* of \w pottage|strong="H5138"\w*: for they \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \add them\add* not.

So they poured \w out|strong="H3332"\w* for the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*. And it came to pass, as they were \w eating|strong="H0398"\w* of the \w pottage|strong="H5138"\w*, that they cried \w out|strong="H6817"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O \add thou\add* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add there is\add* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* in the \w pot|strong="H5518"\w*. And they \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add thereof\add*.

But he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Then \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w meal|strong="H7058"\w*. And he \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \add it\add* into the \w pot|strong="H5518"\w*; and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Pour \w out|strong="H3332"\w* for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that they may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*. And there was no \w harm|strong="H1697"\w* in the \w pot|strong="H5518"\w*.\f + \fr 4.41 \ft harm: Heb. evil thing\f*

¶ And there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* from \w Baal-shalisha|strong="H1190"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of the \w firstfruits|strong="H1061"\w*, \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w loaves|strong="H3899"\w* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*, and full ears of \w corn|strong="H3759"\w* in the \w husk|strong="H6861"\w* thereof. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that they may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.\f + \fr 4.42 \ft the husk…: or, his scrip, or, garment\f*

And his \w servitor|strong="H8334"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What, should I \w set|strong="H5414"\w* this \w before|strong="H6440"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*? He said \w again|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that they may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*: for thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, They shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and shall \w leave|strong="H3498"\w* \add thereof\add*.

So he \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, and they did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \add thereof\add*, according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
